articles.author: Yaruqhullah Khan
articles.title: Railways mentioned only once, allocation maintained in 2024-25 Budget - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Railway stocks like RVNL, IRFC, Ircon International, RailTel Corporation of India, and Texmaco Rail & Engineering fell around 1-5 percent after FM Sitharaman's Budget Speech concluded on July 23
articles.content:
The Indian Railways was mentioned only once in the Budget speech of Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on July 23, contrary to the expectations.
While speaking about Andhra Pradesh Reorganization A… [+2338 chars]
